1. City Council

City Council

  • City Council Meets every 2nd & 4th Monday of the month at 6:00 pm
  • Videos can be found by CLICKING HERE and are also located on our Youtube channel HERE .  Videos are uploaded after meeting or by next business day.
  • LIVE meeting video can be accessed at the top of the page.  On meeting days a red watch live button will be visible.
